tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE nanomaterials (
  material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_name VARCHAR(255),
  chemical_formula VARCHAR(50),
  molecular_weight DECIMAL(10, 2),
  melting_point DECIMAL(8, 2),
  band_gap_energy DECIMAL(6, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE Nanomaterials (
    material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_name TEXT,
    material_type TEXT,
    molecular_structure TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE MaterialProperties (
    prop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id INT,
    density FLOAT,
    melting_point FLOAT,
    boiling_point FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE ResearchPlans (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plan_name TEXT,
    researcher_name TEXT,
    materials_needed TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE AnalysisResults (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    research_id INT,
    analysis_date DATE,
    analysis_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Nanomaterials (
  material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_name VARCHAR(255),
  structure TEXT,
  size INT
)

CREATE TABLE Researcher (
  researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
  affiliation VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Experiments (
  experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_id INT,
  material_id INT,
  experiment_date DATE,
  result TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Properties (
  property_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_id INT,
  property_name VARCHAR(255),
  property_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Analysis (
  analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_id INT,
  researcher_id INT,
  analysis_date DATE,
  findings TEXT
)
